actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported adversely to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 95-25.
Motion to indefinitely postpone consideration passed House.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to disapprove the determination of the President denying import relief under the Trade Act of 1974 to the U.S. honey industry.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of Congress with respect to the action taken by, or the determination of, the President (under the authority conferred by the Trade Act of 1974) to adjust customs duties to prevent serious injury to an industry) transmitted to the Congress on August 28, 1976.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to disapprove the determination of the President denying import relief under the Trade Act of 1974 to the U.S. honey industry.
